params.amount0Max: the maximum amount of token0 msg.sender willing to input
params.amount0Min: the minimum amount of token0 actually input (slippage protection)
params.amount1Max: the maximum amount of token1 msg.sender willing to input
params.amount1Min: the minimum amount of token1 actually input (slippage protection)
params.pool: address of ArrakisVaultV1 pool to add liquidity to
params.receiver: account to receive minted ArrakisVaultV1 tokens

returns.amount0: amount of token0 transferred from msg.sender to mint `mintAmount`
returns.amount1: amount of token1 transferred from msg.sender to mint `mintAmount`
returns.mintAmount: amount of ArrakisVaultV1 tokens minted and transferred to `receiver`

params.gauge: the address of the LiquidityGauge corresponding to the ArrakisVaultV1
the address of the LiquidityGauge corresponding to the ArrakisVaultV1

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.amount0Min: Minimum amount of token0 received after burn (slippage protection)
params.amount1Min: Minimum amount of token1 received after burn (slippage protection)
params.burnAmount: The number of ArrakisVaultV1 tokens to burn
params.receiver: The account to receive the underlying amounts of token0 and token1

returns.amount0: actual amount of token0 transferred to receiver for burning `burnAmount`
returns.amount1: actual amount of token1 transferred to receiver for burning `burnAmount`
returns.liquidityBurned: amount of liquidity removed from the underlying Uniswap V3 position

params.gauge: the address of the LiquidityGauge corresponding to the ArrakisVaultV1
the address of the LiquidityGauge corresponding to the ArrakisVaultV1

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addLiquidity(address,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: addLiquidity adds liquidity to ArrakisVaultV1 pool of interest (mints LP tokens)

addLiquidityAndStake(address,uint256,uin.notice: addLiquidityAndStake same as addLiquidity except Arrakis LP token is immediately staked in corresponding LiquidityGauge. New param:

addLiquidityETH(address,uint256,uint256,.notice: addLiquidityETH same as addLiquidity but expects ETH transfers (instead of WETH)

addLiquidityETHAndStake(address,uint256,.notice: addLiquidityETHAndStake same as addLiquidityETH except Arrakis LP token is immediately staked in corresponding LiquidityGauge. New param:

removeLiquidity(address,uint256,uint256,.notice: removeLiquidity removes liquidity from a ArrakisVaultV1 pool and burns LP tokens

removeLiquidityAndUnstake(address,uint25.notice: removeLiquidityAndUnstake same as removeLiquidity except Arrakis LP token is first unstaked from liquidity gauge, and all rewards for msg.sender collected. New param:

removeLiquidityETH(address,uint256,uint2.notice: removeLiquidityETH same as removeLiquidity except this function unwraps WETH and sends ETH to receiver account

removeLiquidityETHAndUnstake(address,uin.notice: removeLiquidityAndUnstake same as removeLiquidity except Arrakis LP token is first unstaked from liquidity gauge, and all rewards for msg.sender collected. New param:
